name: Gravity Verge
description:
Metroidvania with a (gravity) twist.

This is evolution of LudumDare#45 prototype.

Two main ideas :

  • dynamic gravity  --  demo level is cube 30x30x30m you can freely explore, including asteroid floating nearby;
  • projectile color mixing/matching -- player can find up to 3 pods that shooting different colors (red-green-blue), certain obstacles can only be destroyed with projectile of certain color;

Demo-level goal is to find all key-runes needed to activate portal (and to leave this strange cube-world). In the process, you have to solve some puzzles and survive some enemies.
